localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title:
Finance Twitter has been unbelievable these past few days

Everyone has been on their game

GameStop Twitter may rival “funding secured” Twitter at this point 

Nice work everyone
blogPost.author: Ben Carlson

localize.full_text:
财经微博这几天的表现让人匪夷所思

每个人都在玩自己的游戏

GameStop推特此时或可媲美 "资金有保障 "的推特。

大家辛苦了

財經微博這幾天的表現讓人匪夷所思

每個人都在玩自己的遊戲

GameStop推特此時或可媲美 "資金有保障 "的推特。

大家辛苦了

previous.excerpt:
I'll be honest I'm investing for the first time this week and just looking for
some info from more experienced investors. Too me $rycey seems like a solid long
term investment. They were around 10 dollars a share before covid and closer to
20 earlier in 2019.
previous.title: Anyone have any thoughts on Rolls-Royce being a pretty good long term invested. Their shares are at an all time low right now. $1.35

localize.title: 谁有什么想法，劳斯莱斯是一个相当不错的长期投资。他们的股价现在处于历史低位。$1.35
localize.the_new_excerpt:
说实话，我这周第一次投资，只是想寻找
一些信息从更有经验的投资者。对我来说，$rycey似乎是一个坚实的长线。
长期投资。他们在covid之前是每股10美元左右，接近于
在2019年早些时候，20。

localize.title: 誰有什麼想法，勞斯萊斯是一個相當不錯的長期投資。他們的股價現在處於歷史低位。$1.35
localize.the_new_excerpt:
說實話，我這周第一次投資，只是想尋找
一些信息從更有經驗的投資者。對我來說，$rycey似乎是一個堅實的長線。
長期投資。他們在covid之前是每股10美元左右，接近於
在2019年早些時候，20。
